Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/95th-96th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove, then resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th-96th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove, then resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th-96th.

Allow extra travel time.
